# Data Sources

:::{.callout-note appearance="simple"}
## Observational Data References

- **Chlorophyll**: OCCCI version 5 monthly climatology
- **Primary Production & CaCO₃**: [Laufkötter et al. (2016)](https://bg.copernicus.org/articles/13/4111/2016/)
- **Export Production**: [Weber et al. (2024)](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1748-9326/ad1e7f)
- **Plankton Biomass**: [Laufkötter et al. (2016)](https://bg.copernicus.org/articles/13/4111/2016/); [Henschke et al. (2021)](https://bg.copernicus.org/articles/18/1291/2021/) (jellyfish)
- **Nutrients**: [World Ocean Atlas 2018](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/access/metadata/landing-page/bin/iso?id=gov.noaa.nodc:NCEI-WOA18)
- **pCO₂**: [Global Carbon Budget 2022](https://essd.copernicus.org/articles/14/4811/2022/)
- **Temperature & Salinity**: WOA18 (2005-2018 period)
:::
